content: this legal text discusses the progress of a case involving the division of a deceased persons estate the court has ordered the dissolution of the community property and has allocated specific portions of the property to each party involved additionally the court has ordered certain parties to pay outstanding balances and has condemned others to pay their share of liabilities counterclaims made by some parties have been deemed inadmissible the court has also rejected a request for an account of restitution of fruits the parties involved are responsible for bearing the costs of the proceedings and certain parties are entitled to receive payment for their costs finally the judgment will be transcribed by the land registrar
